description:
.NET Core is a general purpose development platform maintained by Microsoft and the .NET community on GitHub. It is cross-platform, supporting Windows, macOS and Linux, and can be used in device, cloud, and embedded/IoT scenarios.

The ASP.NET Core Runtime enables you to run existing web/server applications.

This is a *metapackage*, which installs the latest release of ASP.NET Core Runtime across all versions.
displayName: Microsoft ASP.NET Core Runtime and Shared Framework
summary: The ASP.NET Core Runtime enables you to run existing web/server applications.
author: Microsoft
